panels.description: NOTE: The monitoring server needs to be ON to show Automation traffic lights properly.
panels.title: Server's Availability

panels.description:
Check the application's availability using ping and the application's health status API. 
NOTE: The monitoring server needs to be ON to show other metrics properly.
panels.title: Inspire heartbeat

panels.description: NOTE: The monitoring server needs to be ON to show Scaler and Interactive traffic lights properly.

targets.expr: avg_over_time((sum without() (node_systemd_unit_state{state="active", name=~"Inspire.*service", instanceName="cnjdoh-dev", instance!~"monitoring.*"}) or (0 * sum_over_time(node_systemd_unit_state{state="active", name=~"Inspire.*service", instanceName="cnjdoh-dev", instance!~"monitoring.*"}[$__range])))[$__range:1m]) * 100

avg_over_time((sum without() (windows_service_state{state="running", name="inspire scaler 30600", instanceName="cnjdoh-qar-nonprod"}) or (0 * sum_over_time(windows_service_state{state="running", name="inspire scaler 30600", instanceName="cnjdoh-qar-nonprod"}[$__range])))[$__range:1m]) * 100

avg_over_time((sum without() (windows_service_state{state="running", name="icm_30535", instanceName="cnjdoh-qar-nonprod"}) or (0 * sum_over_time(windows_service_state{state="running", name="icm_30535", instanceName="cnjdoh-qar-nonprod"}[$__range])))[$__range:1m]) * 100

avg_over_time((sum without() (windows_service_state{state="running", name="ips_30354", instanceName="cnjdoh-qar-nonprod"}) or (0 * sum_over_time(windows_service_state{state="running", name="ips_30354", instanceName="cnjdoh-qar-nonprod"}[$__range])))[$__range:1m]) * 100

avg_over_time((sum without() (windows_service_state{state="running", name="mssqlserver", instanceName="cnjdoh-qar-nonprod"}) or (0 * sum_over_time(windows_service_state{state="running", name="mssqlserver", instanceName="cnjdoh-qar-nonprod"}[$__range])))[$__range:1m]) * 100

avg_over_time((sum without() (windows_service_state{state="running", name="ondemand load data (archive)", instanceName="cnjdoh-qar-nonprod"}) or (0 * sum_over_time(windows_service_state{state="running", name="ondemand load data (archive)", instanceName="cnjdoh-qar-nonprod"}[$__range])))[$__range:1m]) * 100

panels.title: Inspire heartbeat percentage

panels.description: NOTE: The monitoring server needs to be ON to show Scaler and Interactive traffic lights properly.
panels.title: Server's Percentage Availability

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AddonAzureBackupJobs
| where JobOperation=="Backup"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by JobUniqueId
| where JobStatus=="Completed"
| join kind=inner
(
    CoreAzureBackup
    | where OperationName == "BackupItem"
    | where BackupItemType =="VM" and BackupManagementType=="IaaSVM"
    | distinct BackupItemUniqueId, BackupItemFriendlyName
)
on BackupItemUniqueId
| where JobStartDateTime > ago(24h)
| project BackupItemFriendlyName1, JobOperation, JobStatus, JobStartDateTime

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (httpMethod_s == "POST" or httpMethod_s == "GET")
    and requestUri_s startswith "/rest/api/"
    and timeTaken_d > 3
    and TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)  // Filter data for the last 24 hours
| project TimeStamp = timeStamp_t, TimeTaken = timeTaken_d, RequestType = httpMethod_s, RequestEndpoint = requestUri_s, RequestStatus = httpStatus_d, clientIP_s, host_s, serverRouted_s, instanceId_s, receivedBytes_d, sentBytes_d, clientResponseTime_d, serverResponseLatency_s
| sort by TimeTaken desc
| summarize RequestCount = count() by RequestType, RequestEndpoint
| render table

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (httpMethod_s == "POST" or httpMethod_s == "GET")
    and requestUri_s startswith "/rest/api/"
    and httpStatus_d < 299
    and TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| project timeStamp_t, RequestType = httpMethod_s, RequestEndpoint = requestUri_s, RequestStatus = httpStatus_d, clientIP_s, host_s, serverRouted_s, instanceId_s, receivedBytes_d, sentBytes_d, timeTaken_d, clientResponseTime_d, serverResponseLatency_s
| summarize RequestCount = count(), AvgTimeTaken = avg(timeTaken_d) by RequestType, RequestStatus, RequestEndpoint
| order by RequestType desc, RequestCount desc

panels.title: SUCCESSFUL - Average Request Time in (s) Past 24h

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (httpMethod_s == "POST" or httpMethod_s == "GET")
    and requestUri_s startswith "/rest/api/"
    and httpStatus_d >=300
    and TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| project timeStamp_t, RequestType = httpMethod_s, RequestEndpoint = requestUri_s, RequestStatus = httpStatus_d, clientIP_s, host_s, serverRouted_s, instanceId_s, receivedBytes_d, sentBytes_d, timeTaken_d, clientResponseTime_d, serverResponseLatency_s
| summarize RequestCount = count(), AvgTimeTaken = avg(timeTaken_d) by RequestType, RequestStatus, RequestEndpoint
| order by RequestType desc, RequestCount desc

panels.title: FAILED - Average Request Time in (s) Past 24h

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (httpMethod_s == "POST" or httpMethod_s == "GET")
    and requestUri_s startswith "/rest/api/"
    and timeTaken_d > 3
    and TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)  // Filter data for the last 24 hours
| project TimeStamp = timeStamp_t, TimeTaken = timeTaken_d, RequestType = httpMethod_s, RequestEndpoint = requestUri_s, RequestStatus = httpStatus_d
| sort by TimeTaken desc
| summarize RequestCount = count()

panels.title: AppGW Number of requests over 3s Past 24h

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (httpMethod_s == "POST" or httpMethod_s == "GET")
    and requestUri_s startswith "/rest/api/"
    and timeTaken_d > 1800 // 1800 seconds = 30 minutes
    and TimeGenerated >= ago(24h) // Filter data for the last 24 hours
| project TimeStamp = timeStamp_t, TimeTaken = timeTaken_d, RequestType = httpMethod_s, RequestEndpoint = requestUri_s, RequestStatus = httpStatus_d
| sort by TimeTaken desc
| summarize RequestCount = count()

panels.title: AppGW Number of requests over 30m Past 24h

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "APPLICATIONGATEWAYS"
    and OperationName == "ApplicationGatewayAccess"
    and (httpMethod_s == "POST" or httpMethod_s == "GET")
    and requestUri_s startswith "/rest/api/"
    and timeTaken_d > 3 // Filter entries with timeTaken_d greater than 3 seconds
    and TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| project TimeStamp = timeStamp_t, TimeTaken = timeTaken_d, RequestType = httpMethod_s, RequestEndpoint = requestUri_s, RequestStatus = httpStatus_d, ClientIP = clientIP_s, RecievedBytes = receivedBytes_d, SendBytes = sentBytes_d, ClientResponseTime = clientResponseTime_d, ServerResponseLatency = serverResponseLatency_s

panels.title: Number of requests over 3s - Detail Past 24h

panels.description: Provides the number of deployed workflows for each workflow type, and for each of the following statuse
panels.title: Scaler workflows

panels.description:
Provides the number of all the jobs that are currently being processed.
Use this metric to create custom alerts about the number of currently processed jobs that is rapidly growing. That could indicate issues, for example, with jobs being stuck in a loop in the Script workflow module.
panels.title: Processing jobs

panels.description: Indicates jobs that have been successfully processed.
panels.title: Completed jobs

panels.description: Indicates jobs that failed to process.
panels.title: Failed jobs

panels.description: Indicates jobs that have been successfully processed.
panels.title: Canceled jobs
